description: React skeleton loader that allows customization with some predefined templates.

scripts.format: yarn workspace @nejcm/react-skeleton format && yarn workspace @nejcm/react-skeleton-emotion format
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @nejcm/react-skeleton lint && yarn workspace @nejcm/react-skeleton-emotion lint
scripts.build: yarn workspace @nejcm/react-skeleton build && yarn workspace @nejcm/react-skeleton-emotion build
scripts.validate: yarn workspace @nejcm/react-skeleton validate && yarn workspace @nejcm/react-skeleton-emotion validate
